title.narrative: Fifth Operational Phase of the GEF Small Grants Program - Implementing the program using STAR resources I

description.narrative: Conservation of Globally Significant Biodiversity Through Community-based Initiatives and Actions,Reduction or Avoidance of GHG Emissions While Building Climate Resilience at the Community-level,Reverse and Prevent Desertification/Land Degradation and Mitigate the Effects of Drought in Affected Areas Through Community-based Initiatives and Actions,Sustainable Management of Transboundary Water Bodies at the Community-level,Reduce and Eliminate the Release of Harmful Chemicals into the Environment Through Community-based Initiatives and Actions,Enhance and Strengthen Capacity of Communities and Civil Society to Address Global Environmental Challenges, primarily focusing on biodiversity, climate change and land degradation focal areas, while also covering international waters and POPs,Project Management Cost
